channel.title: Going for 99 wc and fm
channel.description:
Hey, I'm gonna go for 99 woodcutting and firemaking, and I need some suggestions:
1. Where to train 2. What axe to use (Thinking of dragon) 3. How long to train per day

item.title: Going for 99 wc and fm
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

Meh, I am having fun with my Draynor Willows. I might at 95 goto magics.

Read full topic

item.title: Going for 99 wc and fm
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

[quote=“Greg the Xeno, post:11, topic:276255”]99 wc is easy. If your a member train from 80-99 on magics. Yes it is slower but it more profitable (about 45m). But you need alot of patience. OR a bot. Then you can buy 99 fm :)?[/quote]yeah, like 4m for 100k+ maples?

Read full topic

item.description:

dragonfire455:

I was thinking of that, but I forgot where the teaks were. I’ll have to look it up later

cooper:

item.title: Going for 99 wc and fm
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

[quote=“cooper, post:8, topic:276255”][quote author=dragonfire455 link=topic=364823.msg2768626#msg2768626 date=1240969855]

Hey, I’m gonna go for 99 woodcutting and firemaking, and I need some suggestions:

  1. Where to train
  2. What axe to use (Thinking of dragon)
  3. How long to train per day

I started this a while ago, but ended up quitting RuneScape. If I ever go back, I’ll pick up where I left off.
Anyways,
1 - Yews by GE, Teaks on Crash Island or Ape Atoll [can’t remember which], willows at Barbarian outpost/Edgeville yews, Draynor Willows
2 - Dragon/Rune/those new clay axes if they’re good
3 - However much you feel like, it’s up to you
[/quote]I was thinking of cutting the Yews after I git 70-75 wc, they take a long ass time to cut at 65

Oh okay, you might want to try teaks then, iirc they’re about as fast as maple but better xp, but it’s been a while since I’ve played so I could be wrong.[/quote]I was thinking of that, but I forgot where the teaks were. I’ll have to look it up later

Read full topic

item.title: Going for 99 wc and fm
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“dragonfire455, post:7, topic:276255”][quote author=cooper link=topic=364823.msg2768345#msg2768345 date=1240957508]

Hey, I’m gonna go for 99 woodcutting and firemaking, and I need some suggestions:

  1. Where to train
  2. What axe to use (Thinking of dragon)
  3. How long to train per day

I started this a while ago, but ended up quitting RuneScape. If I ever go back, I’ll pick up where I left off.
Anyways,
1 - Yews by GE, Teaks on Crash Island or Ape Atoll [can’t remember which], willows at Barbarian outpost/Edgeville yews, Draynor Willows
2 - Dragon/Rune/those new clay axes if they’re good
3 - However much you feel like, it’s up to you
[/quote]I was thinking of cutting the Yews after I git 70-75 wc, they take a long ass time to cut at 65 :P[/quote]
Oh okay, you might want to try teaks then, iirc they’re about as fast as maple but better xp, but it’s been a while since I’ve played so I could be wrong.

Read full topic
